name: Red Baddies in Blue Sky Town
name_original: Red Baddies in Blue Sky Town
description:
You are the superhero that watches over Blue Sky Town. You protect the people from the forces of evil, using your only power...

Time Rewind

You have a gun, and citizens to save. For the next three days, the evil alliance of The Red Baddies has planned an all-out attack on your city. Every day, you can rewind to the morning as many times as you want.

You have all the time in the world, but will that be enough to save them all?

Good luck, hero!

Credits

Most assets and code have been developed by us during the jam.
Exceptions:
- Particles (Epic Toon FX)
- Toon Shader (Roystan Toon Shader)
- Icons (Pixel Perfect on flaticon)
- Sound effects (Universal Sound FX)
- Background music ("I Knew a Guy" by Kevin MacLeod)
